name: Clock Solitaire
description: Clocks is one of the simplest versions of Solitaire. The deck is split into 13 piles face down, resembling a clock face with the 13th pile in the centre. Match the face up cards with the corresponding number until you uncover all four kings. Clocks is a game of chance and has a completion rate of 1 in 13. Despite this, the game can be quite relaxing and therapeutic
